reviews.review_msg: No Comments
No Comments

Fall04. My favourite history prof ever! About his specific exam questions - they're specific because he specifically gives out what he's going to be asking before the exam! I found his exams verrrrry fair and somewhat easy because he prepares the class so well for him. His lectures are a treat and you look forward to going to them, even at 8:30!
Very amiable, above-average prof with an awesome lecture style. I've heard he's retiring which I hope isn't true. His 8:30 classes really didn't feel like 8:30 classes.
Very passionate about what he teaches.  Helpful if you approach him.  However course material is almost overwhelming, there's so much to know and midterm/final questions require lots of detail.

Awesome prof, his 8:30 lectures always had a comfortable atmosphere and were entertaining! His tests were very fair (he tells you exactly what to expect) and never asked any obscure or unfair questions, only tested the major stuff. Take his class!!!

Good prof.,good lectures.Exams:too specific for survey course (1st year),allows only 1 hr for 3 part exam, including an essay portion.Exams consist of 80% of grade,doesn't allow for student to demonstrate good comprehension.This course is quantity vs. quality.TAs lack knowledge of course material.
He is an awesome prof! His passion for the material can be seen and makes the lecture that much more interesting. He totally makes going to an 8:30 lecture worth it.

Very good prof, very clear, informative, and interesting. Makes 8:30 lectures riveting. If you are interested in Hist, this is a great course and a great prof to take it with. I would take any course with him again.
great lecturer, very fun, tests were hard and needed very specific details but not hard to get a decent mark... I would recommend anyone to take his class... to bad hes retiring I think?
keep up with readings or ur gonna be screwed.  I never did and i ended up scrambling for all my exams.  Exams were marked pretty hard, so it's not an easy A.

I only sleep because it's an 8:30 class, really! But, seriously, I like him. He manages to sort through a lot of the excess stuff (crucial in history) and get to the point. He's also funny in an endearing, goofy way.
Enjoyable lectures due to his presented passion of history

Awesome prof. interesting and you could tell he really cared about what he was teaching. he gets excited about weird stuff like papyrus, but that's part of his charm. take any class u can with him, great guy.
He taught one of my high school teachers too. This was the best prof i ever had. A highly enjoyable time for me
Clearly revels in the subject matter. A good teacher for a 100 level class. Recommended.
The guy dressed up for his lectures. How cool is that? I loved his enthusiasm. His classes were always organized and informative.
Has lively & informative classes. Loves to teach and is loves his area of research and it showed.
Great prof. Very organized and informed about his subject matter.
hes an awesome prof.
No Comments

When a professor is willing to dress up in a halloween outfit that relates to class material, that shows a lot of interest and inspires students. Great lectures. Like story time. I like story time. :)
TAKE HIS CLASSES! Best history prof in the school.
Very lively lectures - never boring. Doesn't even need a mic for the biggest lecture halls!
awesome prof...very interesting
Funny and intelligent makes a killer combo. Dutton is awesome.
Seriously intelligent and intriguing.
No Comments

This proff is crazy. He thinks he knows way- too much. He expects way too much of his students. When you go up to him and ask questions, he only bullies you. He has no right to receive pay from out tuitions when everything he is doing for his leisure.
No Comments
Rather pretentious - one wonders where he got his quasi-brit accent seeing as he was born in Ontario and educated in the U.S.
He was a very hard marker, very unfair and is definatly not someone who should be teaching a first year class
very hard. lots of reading but mostly an interesting guy. especially when you find out he sings.  in latin. enough said.
No Comments
he went over materials too fast..!!  very hard to follow..!!
No Comments
No Comments
